content.label: I love this game, I play it every 6 to 9 months. I try different job combos. Lately I got into the Geomancer class, mage class with zero magic costs. When will Square Enix make the prequel? I want to play the story of the Warriors of Dark stopping the light catastrophe with Noah, Doga, Unei, and Xande before they were really powerful. It could explain why Noah gave the gifts, when the crystal tower and Owen towers were built, and how the cloud of darkness got out of the void.

Leaving this here because the ipad support is horrible and maybe you’ll pay attention to it here.

You need to learn to treat your supporters better. Not wasting another dime with SE just to get horrible updates months later

This wasn’t a great game, but I got my entertainment value out of it. If you like the FF series and you are driven to play all of them and see how they evolved, you can’t go wrong here. It’s pricier than many games, but there’s no ads or in app purchase nonsense, just straight up play time. It took me about 40 hours to play through. The story line is dreadful, the animation is decent but the characters all look like they are 5 years old, it’s laughably bad. But the battle is entertaining, the job system is an interesting evolution, overall it was satisfying to play through and beat the cloud of darkness. I’m playing on an iPhone 8 and it was rock solid stable, no technical issues.
It was for iPad but I bought the regular version why can’t it go full screen for iPad
Plays smooth, but adjustments to what classes can equip what is abhorrent.
Love this game to death Decided to download it again to relive it but after my first boot of the game the audio does not work at all even after Deleting and Redownloading it.
After a long wait, this game has finally been updated for edge to edge displays! The difference in visuals and playability can’t be praised enough!
Audio quality could be better.

Wow! So glad Square is finally getting around to updating their mobile games. The QOL updates for this game are perfect and really make the game shine. Appreciate the auto battle, updated UI, iPhone X support, and more. Thank you! Please continue to do this for all your other games, Square!!
This needs to be optimized for new phones. Yikes until then.

The only issue I have is the lack of joystick support for Bluetooth controllers. The on screen analog works, so why not let the analog stick on my controller work as well? If the game is ever updated, I will update my review and add 5 stars.

title.label: Glitch near the end of game stops you from moving forward

content.label: So frustrated. I got so far in the game only to realize that i'm stuck in the area around dogas manor.
How about adding support for iPad in this app instead of trying to charge $17 for it? It’s been like this for years but I can’t believe in 2019 that it’s still a thing.

The is a game-breaking glitch where if you die your first time through Nepto Temple, you are unable to re-enter the temple.

You can go back, talk to every Viking in the cave and it makes 0 difference. The Enterprise is sitting in the water; there’s nothing I can do about it. I’ve bought a few FF games but things like this don’t give me much confidence that these games are well-ported.

I love this game, but for some reason, it has stopped being able to download recently. I tried everything I could on my end.

I would love to play it again.
I cant believe the ipad is more expensive and can’t use a controller like the iphone veesion.

The game runs flawlessly and the story is awesome, I strongly recommend to play this game if you love RPGs. 

iPad Pro and iPhone X support is definitely needed.

title.label: Bought in bundle; was expecting the 2D version

content.label: These 3D graphics look like garbage. Please give the hand drawn pixel version.

The game plays fairly well, but some things are lacking. There really is very little in game indication of how the mechanics work, and the stats of the “super class” Onion Knight remain at 11 all the way up to max level (not sure if the others work correctly either).

Overall this is a great play and good game. You get time to go through it and passes time while you are waiting at the Dr or on the train etc. only other options that would be nice like they have in other IOS Final Fantasy games is ‘Auto Battle’ and a game + mode where you can replay with the stats and equipment you ended your last game with.

Consistently the app doesn't save and if I go away from it and into another app, when I come back it refreshes to title screen and progress is lost. That's not how mobile games are meant to be played.
What the hell is wrong with Android? Please.
Kinda expensive for a game that can't even support all screens. But still a nostalgic game
Hello, can you enable iTunes file sharing for this game? Great game by the way!

In the Molten Cave there is a secret entrance to fight the boss which is activated by interacting with a rock. The entrance was able to be opened the first time. After saving and returning the next day, the door is sealed again but the rock is no longer able to be activated so as to open the door again. After googling around, this seems to be a bug experienced by others as well. I am disappointed to encounter a game-breaking glitch as I was otherwise quite satisfied with the game. However, $16 is too much to pay for something that stops working after a week.
pls

The game does not display in native wide screen and the resolution is stretched and scaled from 960 x 640 onto the iPhone 6's 1334 x 750 resolution which makes it look ugly.

Please optimize for the new iPhones.

Edit: 3 years later it is now 2017 and the resolution is still awful the iPhone X is out and all of Square Enix games look small and awful on this beautiful display.

Loved this game on the DS, playing it again on iOS is lots of fun. 

I really wish they included that lovely opening film that was included in the DS version though. I understand this might make the file size bigger, but I absolutely loved watching that clip!
I love how FF is the only franchise with the mental fortitude to make their games available for download as an app. It's a shame Pokémon or digimon won't do the same.
Love this game, but I'm stuck because I can't use the mini spell for some reason 😭😭 basically wasted my money

title.label: Lost my quick save - No hard save option

content.label:
Lost my saved game after being beaten in an area, somehow my save disappeared locally. Now I have to restart the entire game...

Saving in this game is a problem, the cloud system is only for one save, you cannot hard save (only quick save), every quick save takes you back to the main menu and you need to load he game again. What kind of UX design is this?

Game is fun, UX is garbage.

I love this RPG. It can last for as little or long as you want. Well made and produced... I wish it was optimized for bigger screens instead of stretched, but at least we can change it back to normal in options. BUT, the PSP version on the PSN has an auto-battle option that would really improve the gameplay for mobile. Why wasn't that implemented in this version?

For the reviewer who said it was $15 for the first chapter... What are you talking about?!? There aren't chapters, and this is a fully premium game. It's $15 for the whole thing, however long it takes you to beat it.

I've lost all my progress on this game. The cloud save is a disaster and needs to be fixed. You can only save one local game and one in the cloud. This makes it extremely easy to mess up and lose all your progress. Please allow multiple saves and quick saves and I will update to a five star.

I beat this game in 3 days after purchasing it for the IPhone 7. Runs beautifully and smoothly. Also, having a guide with this game is HIGHLY recommended. Final Fantasy 3 Wiki Guide really helped me get through the game (along with tackling the challenging side quests and bosses). Was super fun, challenging and unforgettable.
Seems like a graphically cleaner port of the DS version. Controls are pretty smooth. Definitely a good pick for when you have a lot of time to spend.

Update: where are all these one star reviews coming from?! After all the updates this and every other FF title still runs perfectly! Don't listen to the trolls

 So I beat this game a while back as a part of my crusade to purchase and beat all FF games on the App Store. This...game...is...a...masterpiece!!!!! I LOVE the old school polygonal pixely 64-graphics. It brings me back to the days of playing Zelda on my N64. Not to mention Quest 64...the best turn-based RPG ever for the N64. Needless to say this is without a doubt the most amazing Final Fantasy game I've ever played! By far the best and most enjoyable part of this game is the sophisticated job class system, where you can change each party member's job class at any time during the game as much as you want with a total of 23 classes becoming available to you throughout the game. The boss battles are EPIC and unforgettable. Probably the best of all the Final Fantasy games, with the final boss being one of the hardest son of a guns I've ever faced! Everything about this game is so incredibly rewarding, from beating that tough boss that's been slaughtering you to shreds to the mind blowing story line. It's the best 16 bucks you could ever hope to spend in the App Store!!!❤️❤️❤️

Next stop...Final Fantasy IV!!!!!!!

title.label: Please add option for old graphics

content.label: The new graphics really ruin the game. Can we have an option to be able to play the game with retro graphics?

The game is fine and good, don't listen to those souring over a "chapter" just because they don't know where to go to progress, then proceed to rate the game poorly based on their incompetence. There's no handholding here in this FF, you may wander into an area you shouldn't and get mauled or you may just not know where to go. This is one whole game and it is beatable, don't listen to the sourcats!

title.label: Onion Knight armor and weapon drop rate...

content.label:
Played the game from the NES and DS. My main issue, is the drop rate for the Onion Knight Armor gear and their weapons. 

The Red Dragon drops the Armor Piece.

The Green Dragon drops the Onion Gauntlets. 

And the Yellow Dragon drops the Onion Helmet. 

All of the dragons also has a CHANCE to drop Onion Sword (extremely rare) and the Onion Shield (Rare).

The drops rates for all of them are HORRIBLE I spend days and days; weeks and weeks; months and months; even years! For over a year I only gotten the Onion Shields. And nothing else. The drop rate should increase more! Having the drops rates like 2-5% chance is just bad! All I keep getting is Elixir, like seriously. And when I finally get something from Onion's; it's an Onion Shield. At least boost up the drop rate for the Onion Armor and weapon to 25-30% drop rate. Because this 2-5% chance drop rate is annoying! I have many hours on this game to complete the set for my characters and still nothing. Please! Make the Onion Knight Armors and Weapon drop rates at least to 25-30% drop rate! 
I mean, finding the dragons are hard enough to find; so why make it 3x harder to find the complete set for the Onion Knight class. Please, increase the drop rate for the Onion Knights Gear and Weapon. Please.
Its still my favorite of all time. After the first chapter I couldn't get off. It's always had me hooked.
The game seems to end after the first mission. Am I missing something?
Was there really no where yu could tell me I was spending $15 on just the first chapter?! I'm very unhappy right now! Good game, sure wish I could finish it!
Good but wish it still had an option for original graphics.
Still a wonderful game to play when out and about ;)
Won't let me finish the game will not allow me to inspect dragon mouth. Please fix

The game is a great port. My only problem is the save mechanism. If you save in the game it exits the game.  If you die your local copy of the game is deleted. So to save you have to quick save in the game the upload to the cloud. And if you die then download from the cloud. Outside of that its great.

its a wonderful game. i got lost where to go about 7 times in the game. besides that, its very challengin.
my only problem i have now is that i made it to the last boss at least ( wastnt able to beat the game yet ) i was playin it on the iphone5. and now that i have the iphone6s, and i redownload the game so i can try to finish it, it tells me that i have NO data of the game and somehow icloud didnt save the game either even if i back up the fone and used icloud to save progress of my game making sure that i dont loose my data. Now i have to start from the begginin of the game ( which im not ) so i paid for the game just to end up restarting all over again??? any way for me to obtain my data?? its really unfair after playin the game for 3 months.
Plz fix. It didn't work.

It's the exact same as the one I played on the Nintendo DS,and I like that because than I don't have to go out and buy another one and/or have to carry a type of DS with me all day because it's in my Iphone!!!

I bought the bundle to play on my iPad and they all play on iPad except one. This game. says it plays in iPad but wait what? You have to buy it AGAIN. No thanks. I didn't buy the bundle for ipad for one game to not work. And I won't buy it again separately
